@D255:

It's SP1. During installation, it asks the version to install; home, pro or ultimate & 64-bit or 32-bit. It worked perfect for me! :-)

Btw, home, pro and ultimate only differ in terms of security updates. Those updates are useless as we all use antivirus and internet security softwares. Those updates boot hardware and driver support.
